text: He ahale kitaba! Timro najikama niscaya nai hamro paigambara a'isakeko cha. Jasale ki timila'i kitabako dherai yasta kuraharu spasta gardaicha juna timile luka'umdathyau ra timra dherai trutiharula'i ksama gardaicha. Nihsandeha timro najikama allahabata prakasa ra spasta kitaba (kura'ana) a'isakeko cha
